page.title: 08BYPASS
page.content: In early days it was thought that the Pensarn and Abergele by-pass would take trade away from the town. One local newspaper in 1978 said,{"Fears {that the opening of the Abergele {by-pass would signal the end of the {town as a shopping centre have been {proved wrong by the present success of {Abergele traders..." It was built to stop congestion on the town roads. It is due to become part of the new North Wales expressway being finished at the moment (1985). At this time it is just part of the A55 North Wales coast road. The by-pass was also built to remove a notorious trouble area on the approach to Abergele and Llanddulas further on.
